content.question: The composition and placement of Rodin’s The Burghers of Calais are intended to elicit which of the following responses from its viewers?

choices.label: A sense of victory and national pride
An impression of stillness and death
A personal connection with the individuals depicted
A feeling of awe at the men’s elevated status

content.answer: A personal connection with the individuals depicted

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
